sys_script_include.name: Jira

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_986617861b2e445048a242e58d4bcb25
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_momo_jira_integr.Jira</api_name><caller_access>2</caller_access><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>Jira</name><script><![CDATA[var Jira = Class.create();
Jira.prototype = {
  baseUrl: null,
  initialize: function (applicationName, hostname, basePath) {
    // Setting these so we can have some immutablity with
    // the arguments;
    var app = applicationName;
    var host = hostname;
    var base = basePath;

    // defaults to the jira scoped app.
    if (!app) {
      app = 'x_momo_jira_integr';
    }
    
    if (!host) {
      host = gs.getProperty(app + '.instance_name');
    }
    if (!base) {
      base = gs.getProperty(app + '.base_path');
    }
    // Double check to make sure that the configuration property is set
    // if it is not throw an error.
    if (!base || !host) {
      var errorMsg = 'You are missing either your hostname or base rest url for your JIRA request.';
      gs.error(errorMsg);
      gs.addErrorMessage(errorMsg);
      return;
    }
    this.baseUrl = host + '/' + base;
  },
  create: function(path, method, cb) {
    var url = this.baseUrl + '/' + (path ? gs.urlEncode(path) : '');
    var callback = function(error, response) {
      return {
        response: response,
        error: error
      };
    };


    if (!cb) return callback();
  },
  deserialize: function(body) {

  },
  type: 'Jira'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>douglas.schamberg</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-01-26 14:20:25</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>986617861b2e445048a242e58d4bcb25</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Jira</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Jira Integration" source="x_momo_jira_integr">ec964aa3dbd2c810f25513296896194c</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Integration">ec964aa3dbd2c810f25513296896194c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_986617861b2e445048a242e58d4bcb25</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>douglas.schamberg@movement.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-01-26 14:36:10</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
